title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to a field, the search results are not being selected. The expected behavior is to receive 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
OB: When searching for references to a field, the search results are not being selected. No matches are highlighted in the method getTempDir().
EB: You should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir(). The search results should be highlighted and selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the search functionality.
3. Search for references to a specific field.
4. Observe that the search results are not being selected and no matches are highlighted in the method getTempDir().
